title: More logic needed to process disk sorting with border values for row value
OB: When sorting on disk, if sorting on 40000 rows of data and the program is set to process less than 40000 rows, the following operations are performed by DtE: 1.
EB: When sorting on disk, if there are 40000 rows of data and the program is set to process less than 40000 rows, the expected behavior should be as follows: 1. Save the file as a temporary file. 2. Load the file into memory. 3. Sort the data. 4. Save the file to the temporary file.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Sort 40000 rows of data on disk. 2. Set the program to process less than 40000 rows of data. 3. Observe the operations performed by DtE as mentioned in the observed behavior.
